sqlMap.select:
SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , B.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',B.PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM , A.FCLTS_GBN , CASE A.FCLTS_GBN WHEN '1' THEN '1종' WHEN '2' THEN '2종' WHEN '3' THEN '1종/2종' WHEN '9' THEN '기타' ELSE '기타' END AS FCLTS_GBN_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_SE_NM(B.FCLTS_SE) AS FCLTS_SE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_KND_NM(B.FCLTS_KND) AS FCLTS_KND_NM ,TO_CHAR(B.BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT , A.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , A.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT , A.CNST_DT , A.OWNER , A.CNSTRTR , B.LOC , A.YEAR , A.SN , TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_DE_ONE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHCK_DE_ONE , A.INSCTR_ONE , A.CHCK_CN_ONE , A.STTUS_EVL_ONE , A.PHOTO_ONE , A.CHCK_TABLE_ONE , TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_DE_TWO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHCK_DE_TWO , A.INSCTR_TWO , A.CHCK_CN_TWO , A.STTUS_EVL_TWO , A.PHOTO_TWO , A.CHCK_TABLE_TWO , TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_DE_THREE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHCK_DE_THREE , A.INSCTR_THREE , A.CHCK_CN_THREE , A.STTUS_EVL_THREE , A.PHOTO_THREE , A.CHCK_TABLE_THREE , A.REGISTER , A.RGSDE , A.UPDUSR , A.UPDDE FROM FENDER_INSPECTION A INNER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F B USING (FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.YEAR = #sYear#
AND B.FCLTS_GBN = #sFcltsGbn#
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND B.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM like '%'||#sFcltsMngGroupNm#||'%'
ORDER BY A.YEAR DESC ) S

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM( SELECT T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO , T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T2.STRCT_FMT AS STRCT_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.BERTH,0),'99,990')) AS BERTH ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T2.FENDER_KND_CD AS FENDER_KND_CD ,T2.FENDER_PMNT_ITV AS FENDER_PMNT_ITV ,T2.FENDER_FMT AS FENDER_FMT ,DECODE(T3.FCLTS_MNG_NO,NULL,'','TRUE') CHK_ROLE ,T3.REMARK FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'C' AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = 'C1' AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#) LEFT OUTER JOIN FENDER_INSPECTION_LIST T3 ON (T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T3.FCLTS_MNG_NO
AND T3.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND YEAR = #sYear# AND SN = #sSn#
AND SE = #sSe#
)
ORDER BY GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ) S
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(SN),0)+1 FROM FENDER_INSPECTION WHERE YEAR= #year# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
INSERT INTO FENDER_INSPECTION(YEAR , SN , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_GBN , CNST_DT , OWNER , CNSTRTR , PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT , CHCK_DE_ONE , INSCTR_ONE , CHCK_CN_ONE , STTUS_EVL_ONE , PHOTO_ONE , CHCK_TABLE_ONE , CHCK_DE_TWO , INSCTR_TWO , CHCK_CN_TWO , STTUS_EVL_TWO , PHOTO_TWO , CHCK_TABLE_TWO , CHCK_DE_THREE , INSCTR_THREE , CHCK_CN_THREE , STTUS_EVL_THREE , PHOTO_THREE , CHCK_TABLE_THREE , REGISTER , RGSDE) VALUES ( #year# , #sn# , #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsGbn# , #cnstDt# , #owner# , #cnstrtr# , #prtFcltyStndrd# , #prtPrtFcltyCnt# , TO_DATE(#chckDeOne#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #insctrOne# , #chckCnOne# , #sttusEvlOne# , #photoOne# , #chckTableOne# , TO_DATE(#chckDeTwo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #insctrTwo# , #chckCnTwo# , #sttusEvlTwo# , #photoTwo# , #chckTableTwo# , TO_DATE(#chckDeThree#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #insctrThree# , #chckCnThree# , #sttusEvlThree# , #photoThree# , #chckTableThree# , #register# , sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FENDER_INSPECTION SET CHCK_DE_ONE = TO_DATE(#chckDeOne#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , INSCTR_ONE = #insctrOne# , CHCK_CN_ONE = #chckCnOne# , STTUS_EVL_ONE = #sttusEvlOne# , PHOTO_ONE = #photoOne# , CHCK_TABLE_ONE = #chckTableOne# , CHCK_DE_TWO = TO_DATE(#chckDeTwo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , INSCTR_TWO = #insctrTwo# , CHCK_CN_TWO = #chckCnTwo# , STTUS_EVL_TWO = #sttusEvlTwo# , PHOTO_TWO = #photoTwo# , CHCK_TABLE_TWO = #chckTableTwo# , CHCK_DE_THREE = TO_DATE(#chckDeThree#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , INSCTR_THREE = #insctrThree# , CHCK_CN_THREE = #chckCnThree# , STTUS_EVL_THREE = #sttusEvlThree# , PHOTO_THREE = #photoThree# , CHCK_TABLE_THREE = #chckTableThree# , UPDUSR = #updusr# , UPDDE = sysdate WHERE YEAR = #year# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND SN = #sn#
sqlMap.delete: delete from FENDER_INSPECTION WHERE YEAR = #year# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND SN = #sn#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FENDER_INSPECTION_LIST( YEAR , SN , SE , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_MNG_NO , REGISTER , RGSDE , REMARK ) values( #year# , #sn# , #se# , #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsMngNo# , #register# , sysdate , #remark#
)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FENDER_INSPECTION_LIST WHERE YEAR = #year# AND SN = #sn# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
